title: Why did Charlotte Church fall out with her parents and what's her net worth?
text:
Charlotte Church is healing her rift with her parents in the documentary My Family And Me (Picture: Channel 4)

Singer Charlotte Church is set to return to screens on Thursday night in the documentary Charlotte Church: My Family And Me.

The Channel 4 show will follow Charlotte as she heads off to a remote lodge in Devon with mum Maria and stepdad James, aiming to heal a rift with her parents which dates back to when she was a teenager.

She’ll be appearing on This Morning on Tuesday to talk about the programme – which was filmed after James was diagnosed with AL amyloidosis – a rare illness which is terminal.

But just what did happen between Charlotte and her parents – and what else do we know about the mum of two?

Here’s what you need to know…

Why did Charlotte Church fall out with her parents?

Charlotte opens up on the programme about the incident, which saw her fall out with her parents when she was 16 over her then boyfriend, DJ Steven Johnson.

The then teenager walked out and did not speak to her folks for nearly two years – resulting in mum Maria having a breakdown.

Charlotte walked out on her parents when she was 16 (Picture: Channel 4)

She says on the show: ‘I was heartbroken. She wouldn’t speak to me for about a year and a half.

‘I just totally collapsed. I went in on myself and had a nervous breakdown. I lost the plot for a while.’

Charlotte first found fame as a classical singer, releasing her debut album in 1998 (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

Charlotte also admits: ‘We had a blazing row and I just said, “I don’t have to do this. I’m not going to live with you. I don’t need to live with you any more. I’m moving out”.’

She goes on to confess to dealing with the situation ‘awfully’.

When was Charlotte Church with Gavin Henson?

Charlotte and Gavin Henson have two children together – but split in 2010 (Picture: WireImage)

Charlotte and rugby star Gavin were together for several years during the Noughties.

The pair had two children together, daughter Ruby who was born in 2007, and son Dexter who followed in 2009.

They became engaged in 2010 – but split up just six weeks later.

Gavin has since married girlfriend Katie Wilson, with the pair tying the knot just last month.

Charlotte is now married to musician Johnny Powell, whom she has been with since 2010.

What is Charlotte Church’s net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth the singer is worth $8m (£6.3m).

She has released six studio albums and sold over 10m records worldwide, with her 1998 debut Voice Of An Angel going double platinum in the US and UK.

Catch Charlotte on This Morning on ITV from 10.30am.
